title: [Whistler's Pass, Iron Bridge]
description: A wrought-iron statue of a drake spreads its wings out wide, its neck extended towards the heavens.  A torch burns in the drake's mouth.  At the south end of the bridge a series of steps lead up to a hill.  To the north, the bridge ends at another hilltop.
